General.Name: Shenzhen New Land Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen New Land Tool Planning & Architectural Design Co., Ltd. engages in land and space planning in China. Its services include urban and rural planning, architectural design, municipal design, rail transit design, landscape engineering design, transportation planning, low-carbon urban construction planning, land preparation, and engineering consulting services. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
